channel.title: Npcdrops are coded different?

item.title: Npcdrops are coded different?
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

Okay instead of using npcdrops.cfg, Devolution sources use npcsdrops.java.

My npc drops code looks like this

[code]package server.npcs;

import java.io.;
import server.players.;
import server.util.;
import server.;
//import server.players.Quests.*;

public class npcsdrops {

public static int[][] drops = {

//Man
{1, 526, 1, 1}, {1, 995, 100, 2},
};

}[/code]

For some reason it seems like when you put the chance at 1 its 100%, and when you put the chance at 100 its 1% drop. But when I put 2 items at 1 to be a 100% drop, it only drops 1 item. Can anyone help me figure this out?

Read full topic
